data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Andijon. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Andijon, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Andijon, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 125 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Andijon, Uzbekistan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Andijon hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,899,000 people living in Andijon.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kyrgyz people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Andijon, Uzbekistan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Andijon to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Andijon, Uzbekistan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

location.name: Andijon
location.people_groups_list: Uyghur, Lyuli, Kalmyk-Oirat, Uzbek, Northern, Karakalpak
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Uyghur (48,000), Lyuli (12,000), Kalmyk-Oirat (900), Uzbek, Northern (925,000), Karakalpak (1,300)
